title: Why can Veigar always outdamage after lvl 6?
body: Call me a Gold scrub, but I will say my opinion. I have played mid lane a lot and whenever I play a Mage, after lvl 6 or 11 they fall behind hard to Veigar. Also I agree he has some skillshots but as an ADC what should I do to counter his ult? Buy Zhonya's? I hate how playing against Veigar turns late game into "Dodge my abilities and get ulted for 100% HP"

replies.body: Because his damage is unreliable. Also if you dodge everything and die to ult at 100% health he has like at least 1500 AP and you have literally no health or magic resist.
the same exact thing can be said about old veigar. it literally destroyed him. i saw leblancs rushing this item and then just style all over him knowing there was nothing veigar could do about it.
As an ADC, you buy Night's Edge and use it to avoid his ultimate or E
Then learn to dodge and quit complaining.

They get outdamage because losing any hp makes his ult stronger and he gains AP for killing minions with his abilities/ hitting an adc with an ability. 

Tbh, it's mainly.... camp him and win the game fast enough...Buy a GA/Banshees. It's fairly easy to normally outplay one, but i understand what you're saying.
I am talking as recently I play ADC and besides QSS/Merc for his E we have no counter to his burst in Q/W/R
Get a banshee's second or third item. If you feel like he is falling behind get a hexdrinker instead and just continue your build from there.
Only way he can land q w is if you get stunned as they are unreliable and somewhat short range. His ult is also short range so stay away from him until its down and you will be fine
